name: Plop-Snowman
description:
plop plop plop

Have endless fun with this never-ending clicking game. Who plops the most? *Attention, I am not responsable for destroyed mouse buttons.... *This is an endless game, you can stop anytime! *If you can't stop anymore, I'm not responsible for that either...

Music by: https://eric-the-funny-baron.itch.io/
